entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
